attributes.action: STOP Scotland's Subsidy of £1500 per person
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the decade since devolution, Scotland gets an extra £1,500 a head from Westminster to subsidise care homes for the elderly, free university education and authorise the use of a wide range of cancer drugs denied to patients south of the border.

THIS IS PAID FOR BY US TAX PAYERS South of the Border!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "STOP Scotland's Subsidy of £1500 per person."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15218.asp

Prime Minister's Office
